attributes.action: Increase Public Holidays to 10 to Bring us in line with Europe
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In Britain We have 8 Bank Holidays per year, 4 of these Bank Holidays occur in short space of time   these being the Period from Easter - Spring Holiday. There isn't another bank holiday until August and no more til Christmas. People would love more bank holidays and have them more spaced out. To make Britain in line with the European average we need 10 Bank Holidays. If We had ten  then it would be as follows.  Jan 1st, Jan 2nd(Like Scotland) Good Friday, Easter Monday, May Day, Queens Birthday in June instead of Spring Bank at the end of May  (Like in Austrialia) August, October (To give us a break before winter set in)Christmas Day and Boxing Day.  2 Extra Bank Holidays I would like the Prime Minister to look in to it for the British Public

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
